data.description: The scope of the Secure User Plane Location (SUPL) architecture document is to define the architecture for the SUPL service enabler. A reference architecture is defined including: o Architecture Diagram o Functional blocks o Logical entities o Reference Points / Interfaces o Messages and message flows In addition a number of deployment scenarios are considered including different roaming models as well as different mapping of logical functions to architectural elements. This architecture is based on the requirements listed in the SUPL Requirements document [SUPL RD].

The scope of this document is limited to the Enabler Release Definition of Secure User Plane Location (SUPL) 2.1 according to OMA Release process and the Enabler Release specification baseline listed in section 5.
This document describes the requirements of the Secure User Plane for Location (SUPL).
